Reviews.Title: Scare those bad guys away!
Reviews.Author: mstrixie
Reviews.Content: Great deal for the money. I put these cameras up in my carport, with the sign. Looks real with the red flashing lights. I may be crazy, but it makes me feel safer. Yes, it is plastic, but when it is installed it does the job and for the price it is a good deal.

Reviews.Title: great cameras
Reviews.Author: Katydana "I enjoy reference books, historical...
Reviews.Content: I love these they have foolen everyone..They look and feel real.I even had a police man ask me for footage -m very pleased with this purchase
